A Few Words

CHRISTINA & NATE, OCTOBER 14, 2018

WPPool was easy to work with, always available when reached out to her, and very natural to photograph. She and her assistant were so attentive and focused on the small details that made come out incredible, while still being laid back and making my husband and I feel completely comfortable shooting with her.
